question.validAtomicQuestionIdName: The RDC-ID must start with the project ID (e.g. projectID-variableName) and must be equal to variable ID!
question.uniqueAtomicQuestionName: The name of an atomic question has to be unique within a questionnaire.

id.notEmpty: The RDC-ID of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ, space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

type.notNull: The type of the atomic question must not be empty.
type.atomicQuestionTypeConsistence: The type of the atomic question has an invalid value or is inconsistent between the languages.

name.notEmpty: The name of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
name.size: The max length of the name is 32 signs.

compositeQuestionName.notEmpty: The composite question name of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
compositeQuestionName.size: The max length of the composite question name is 32 signs

footnote.i18nStringSize: The max length of the footnote is 2048 signs.

questionText.i18nStringSize: The max length of the question text is 2048 signs.

instruction.i18nStringSize: The max length of the instruction is 2048 signs.

introduction.i18nStringSize: The max length of the introduction is 2048 signs.

sectionHeader.i18nStringSize: The max length of the section header is 128 signs.

id.notEmpty: The RDC-ID of the Data Acquisition Project must not be empty!
The RDC-ID of the Questionnaire must not be empty!
The RDC-ID of the Variable must not be empty!

postValidation.atomicQuestionHasInvalidVariableId: The Atomic Question {{0}} references an unknown Variable ({{1}}).
postValidation.atomicQuestionHasInvalidQuestionnaireId: The Atomic Question {{0}} references an unknown Questionnaire ({{1}}).
